dict.array:
<% for ( var i = 0; i < emojiGroups.length; i++ ) { %>
Name <%=emojiGroups[i].name%> Type <%=emojiGroups[i].type%> File <%=emojiGroups[i].exportFile%> Icon <%=emojiGroups[i].exportIcon%> SeperateKey <%=emojiGroups[i].seperate%>
<% } %>

<% for ( var i = 0; i < emoticonGroups.length; i++ ) { %>
Name <%=emoticonGroups[i].name%> Type <%=emoticonGroups[i].type%> File <%=emoticonGroups[i].exportFile%> SeperateKey <%=emoticonGroups[i].seperate%>
<% } %>
